frontmatter.title: Third and actual iteration of my personal web

node.html: This is the actual iteration of my personal web, I built it with React JS using the Gatsby framework, which personally I started to love, It's kind of fun build web apps with it and I can learned a lot building with it, I tried to struture everything correctly and I think that I get a good result, so yeah I'm very proud of myself.

frontmatter.title: Second iteration of my personal web

node.html: This time I tried to structure everything correctly, the project was really cool to build, because I applied a new UI style called neumorphism using a really cool library called Tailwind, and the result is pretty awesome, I also tried to implement a blog using firebase but I just did two test entries.

frontmatter.title: First iteration of my personal web

node.html: I used to be a great fan of Vue, so in that moment I decided to build my personal web with Vue, the result was pretty satisfaying but now I look back and it's pretty simple but a little annoying, I learned a lot of things about Vue and how to work with some animations, so yeah, I enjoyed and learned building it.
